title: Pixel 4 XL "Google Stopped Working" message
content:
Certain apps are working fine: Maps, Instagram, FB, Snapchat, Fitbit... all fine.
HOWEVER: Gmail, Google search, Google Assistant, UA Map My Walk... don't open at all, and GOOGLE STOPPED WORKING message appears.  When my phone is idle, the message just randomly appears.
I have: restarted the phone; powered off and waited an hour; gone through settings > Google (cannot go further than this); gone through Google Play > Google > Uninstall > Reinstall (same message appears, can't go further); removed SIM card and reinstalled (nothing changed).  I would rather not do a factory reset, as I'm unsure that would even fix my issue.

This phone was purchased in Nov 2019, it's only 5 months old, in excellent condition.
Not sure what the next steps are.  Any help is greatly appreciated.
